posts.postText:
Post your favorite gamer grub for late night gaming.

Doritos for being the most delicous things I have ever eaten.
 http://www.goodfoods.ca/_images/modules/product/ftipxs2z_small.jpg

Thank god, I though Kryzoid derailed the topic. 
Also these things are like eating 4 Kit-Kats at once
 http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2MOPMi0O_qk/ThucOeXwbqI/AAAAAAAAALc/IIkkDFQzbSE/s1600/kitkat.jpg 

And when I eat one I get all the sweet
 http://archer.gamebanana.com/img/ico/sprays/fps_doug.jpg s

Kry thought of a clever way to avoid that, and I was originally the one to come up with that.


>> Mike Hawk: http://www.nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=24&t=3315
Mike Hawk: I was so tempted
Mike Hawk: to put a penis
Balenti: Mmm
Balenti: sounds delicious
I had an urge to steal your idea without posting a penis, and so I had Kryzoid do it. I win

http://www.pollsb.com/photos/o/37111-mmmm_bacon.jpg 
The king of all that is food.

Yes ladies, that is my thumb. But i'm taken, sorry.
Its all about the Sun Chips
http://www.caswellscoffee.com/e-moms/images/Poptart%20Choco%20Chip.jpg only thing superior is bacon. And where do u get the giant kit kats?
